result.title: Stakeholders database
result.description: Relations management system (xRM) filled with data of > 150 potential stakeholders including: start-ups, SMEs, Large Enterprises, national or EU funded projects, OITBs, networks and key research players and infrastructures, pilot plants and Contract Development and Manufacturing Organizations specialised in Medtech/PPE. Policy makers and public and private procurers will be also targeted.
